casebody.data:
VERA CURETON, ADMX., ETC., PETITIONER-PETITIONER, v. JOMA PLUMBING & HEATING CO., RESPONDENT-RESPONDENT. Messrs. Roslcein, Kronisch, Felzenberg & Mandell for the petitioner. Messrs. Lamb, Langan & Blalce and Mr. Joseph T. Ryan for the respondent. March 26, 1962.

See same case below: 71 N. J. Super. 249.
